dungeoncrawler.gameobject.creature

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeoncrawler.gameobject.GameObject
      • dungeoncrawler.gameobject.creature.Creature
        • dungeoncrawler.gameobject.creature.Player

  • public class Player
extends Creature
    This class represents the player within the game. Only one player object should exist within the game at a time.
    Author:
    Keke

    • Method Detail

      • gainXp

        public void gainXp(int amount)
        This method adds experience to the player. If the player's total experience exceeds the required amount of experience to level up, the player gains a level.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of experience the player should gain
